Package graphics

Class Mesh

java.lang.Object
graphics.Mesh
public class Mesh
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the mesh, texture and shader mapping of an item

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Mesh​(Vertex[] vertices, Vector2f[] textureCoordinates, Vector3f[] normals, int[] indices)
    Class creator, creates a mesh from vertices, texture coordinates, normals and indices
    Mesh​(java.lang.String path)
    Class creator, creates a mesh from a filepath to a mesh object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void bind()
    This function binds the mesh in glfw
    void destroy()
    This function unbinds the mesh and destroys it
    void init()
    This function initializes the mesh, it initializes the mesh to use textures or shaders depending on which one is to be used
    boolean isUsingTexture()
    Getter, this function returns if the mesh uses textures
    void render()
    This function renders the mesh with triangles
    void unbind()
    This function unbinds the mesh in glfw
    void useColor()
    This function sets the mesh to use shaders instead of textures
    void useTexture()
    This function sets the mesh to use textures instead of shaders

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Mesh

      public Mesh​(Vertex[] vertices, Vector2f[] textureCoordinates, Vector3f[] normals, int[] indices)
      Class creator, creates a mesh from vertices, texture coordinates, normals and indices
      Parameters:
      vertices - the coordinates and colors vertices of the mesh
      textureCoordinates - the coordinates to which a texture should be mapped
      normals - the normals of the mesh
      indices - the indices of the mesh

    • Mesh

      public Mesh​(java.lang.String path)
      Class creator, creates a mesh from a filepath to a mesh object
      Parameters:
      path - the filepath of the desired mesh object

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      This function initializes the mesh, it initializes the mesh to use textures or shaders depending on which one is to be used

    • bind

      public void bind()
      This function binds the mesh in glfw

    • unbind

      public void unbind()
      This function unbinds the mesh in glfw

    • render

      public void render()
      This function renders the mesh with triangles

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      This function unbinds the mesh and destroys it

    • useTexture

      public void useTexture()
      This function sets the mesh to use textures instead of shaders

    • useColor

      public void useColor()
      This function sets the mesh to use shaders instead of textures

    • isUsingTexture

      public boolean isUsingTexture()
      Getter, this function returns if the mesh uses textures
      Returns:
      true if mesh is using textures, false otherwise
